column1: '''''Tolkien: In de Ban van zijn Werk''''' (Dutch: ''Tolkien: Under the Spell of his Works'') is an illustrated, introductory booklet to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s works in Dutch. Its title is a play on ''In de Ban van de Ring'' ("Under the Spell of the Ring"), the Dutch title of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.

Tolkien's visit to the Netherlands is treated on pp. 1-4; pp. 4-6 deals with Tolkien's popularity, pp. 6-7 with Tolkien and translators and finally pp. 7-16 with Tolkien's life and work in general.<ref>[[Åke Bertenstam
